info.description: This is the API for my project.
info.title: Proyecto de Ingenieria de  Datos API

get.description: Retrieves disponibilidad slots for a specific day of the week.

post.description: Creates a new tutor availability slot.

get.description: Retrieves a specific disponibilidad by its ID.

400.description: Invalid request body or disponibilidad ID

delete.description: Deletes a disponibilidad slot by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves students filtered by academic program.
Retrieves a specific student by their ID.

400.description: Invalid request body or estudiante ID

delete.description: Deletes a student by their ID.

post.description: Authenticates a student using their email and TI (Tarjeta de Identidad).

401.description: Invalid credentials (user not found or TI mismatch)

post.description: Authenticates users (estudiantes, tutores, or admins) based on the mode parameter.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all materia names.
Retrieves a specific materia by its code.
Retrieves a specific materia by its ID.

400.description: Invalid request body or materia ID

delete.description: Deletes a materia by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves reports filtered by date period.
Retrieves a specific report by its ID.

put.description: Updates the data of an existing report.

400.description: Invalid request body or reporte ID

delete.description: Deletes a report by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves tutores assigned to a specific materia.
Retrieves a specific tutor-materia assignment by its ID.

400.description: Invalid request body or assignment ID

delete.description: Deletes a tutor-materia assignment by its ID.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all tutors.

post.description: Creates a new tutor record using data from an existing student.

400.description: Invalid request body or Estudiante ID

get.description: Returns the count of tutors that have at least one materia assigned.

post.description: Authenticates a tutor using their email and TI (Tarjeta de Identidad), then fetches tutor-specific data.

200.description: Successfully authenticated. Returns combined student and tutor details.

401.description: Invalid credentials or tutor record not found

get.description: Retrieves a specific tutor by their ID.

400.description: Invalid request body or tutor ID

delete.description: Deletes a tutor by their ID.

get.description: Retrieves just the name of a specific tutor by their ID.
Retrieves upcoming tutorias for a specific student that have not started yet.

post.description: Creates a new tutoring session with intelligent tutor assignment and validation.

400.description: Invalid request body or validation failed

get.description: Retrieves a specific tutoria by its ID.

put.description: Updates a specific tutoria with new details.

400.description: Invalid request body or tutoria ID

patch.description: Updates only the asistencia_confirmada field of a specific tutoria using path parameter.

400.description: Invalid request body or tutoria ID

put.description: Updates the status of a specific tutoria.

400.description: Invalid request body or tutoria ID

patch.description: Updates only the estado (status) of a specific tutoria using path parameter.

400.description: Invalid request body or tutoria ID

estudiante_id.description: Changed to int32 to match SelectEstudianteById param type

tutor_id.description: Changed to int32 to match sqlc generated type
Optional: if 0 or not provided, auto-assign qualified tutor

correo.description: Correo is the email of the student.

ti.description: TI is the student's identity number.

time.description: Time zone will be ignored when encoding to PostgreSQL.
